attributes.action: Stop wasting money on the military and use the money to help the japanese economy to ensure that the Otaku industries do not suffer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the military has largly little use, japanese industries like model making animation etc is not only of high class but even makes jobs in other places than just Japan.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
